General.Name: Yellow Cake PLC
General.Description: Yellow Cake plc operates in the uranium sector. It is involved in the purchase and holding of uranium oxide concentrates, and exploitation of other uranium-related opportunities. Yellow Cake plc was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Saint Helier, Jersey.
General.Address: Liberation House, Saint Helier, Jersey, JE1 2LH

0.Name: Mr. Andre Leon Liebenberg B.Sc., M.B.A., MBA
0.Title: CEO & Exec. Director
